All Classes

Class
Description
HumanPlayer
This class is subclass of the Player class that gets it's moves from the input in the console
IllegalMoveException
This class is a custom exception class, used to help throw and catch exceptions and to recover from these.
MockPlayer
This Player subclass is used to test the Nim class takeTurn method.
Nim
This class uses both the Piles and the various Player classes to simulate the Nims game
OptimalPlayer
 
Piles
This class creates and is meant to represent the piles in the game of Nim.
Player
 
RandomPlayer
This class is a subclass of the Player class that makes random choices using a random number generator.
